sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function WebsitePrivacyNotice(props) { return( <>

Website Privacy Notice

Background

This privacy notice sets out we, Kido Education (Singapore) Pte Ltd (also referred to as “us”, “we”, “our”) use and protect any personal information collected or generated in relation to you whilst using our website www.kidovillage.com

We take your privacy seriously and ensure that our operational policies, processes and procedures comply with appropriate data protection regulations around the world including General Data Protection Regulation (EU) 2016 / 679 (“GDPR”) , the UK Data Protection Act 2018 and any successor legislation.

If you have any questions about this Privacy Notice, please contact us at support@kido.school

What is collected and the purpose of processing

The types of personal data collected when you use our website

Session cookies – please see our Cookie policy and the cookie consent pop up tool

If you contact us to find out about our services or to book a trial class or use our Contact Us form you are consenting to provide additional personal contact data in order for us to respond to your request:

Name

Email address

Location / Country

Phone number

Legal basis for processing data

Your consent

When you email us, you are agreeing to us using your data in order to contact you for the reason specified in the email.

IS PERSONAL INFORMATION ABOUT ME SECURE?

Your Kido Village Account is protected by a password for your privacy and security. If you access your Kido Village Account via a third party site or service, you may have additional or different sign-on protections via that third party site or service. You must prevent unauthorized access to your Kido Village Account and Personal Information by selecting and protecting your password and/or other sign-on mechanism appropriately and limiting access to your computer or device and browser by signing off after you have finished accessing your account.

We endeavor to protect the privacy of your Kido Village Account and other Personal Information we hold in our records, but unfortunately, we cannot guarantee complete security. Unauthorized entry or use, hardware or software failure, and other factors, may compromise the security of user information at any time.

Kido Village is based in India (country) and the information we collect is governed by Indian laws. By accessing or using the Kido Village Services or otherwise providing information to us, you consent to the processing and transfer of information in and to India and other countries.

WHAT PERSONAL INFORMATION CAN I ACCESS?

Through your Kido Village Account settings, you may access, and, in some cases, edit or delete the following information you’ve provided to us:

name and password

email address

birth date

location

phone number

address

occupation

user profile information, including your child(ren)’s and/or students’ names, birth dates, immunization records, allergies and other information, as well as any images and videos that you might upload.

The information you can view, update, and delete may change as the Services change. Some of the Personal Information in your Kido Village Account such as your location, phone number, address, email address and user profile information, may be visible to other Members with whom you have confirmed Bookings. If you have any questions about viewing or updating information, we have on file about you, please contact us at support@kidovillage.com.

WHAT CHOICES DO I HAVE?

You can always opt not to disclose information to us, but keep in mind some information may be needed to register with us or to take advantage of some of our features.

You may be able to add, update, or delete information as explained above. When you update information, however, we may maintain a copy of the unrevised information in our records. You may request deletion of your Kido Village Account by contacting us at support@kidovillage.com. Some information may remain in our records after your deletion of such information from your Kido Village Account. We may use any aggregated data derived from or incorporate your Personal Information after you update or delete it, but not in a manner that would identify you personally.

WHAT IF I HAVE QUESTIONS ABOUT THIS POLICY?

If you have any questions or concerns regarding our privacy policies, please send us a detailed message to support@kidovillage.com, and we will try to resolve your concerns.

) } export default WebsitePrivacyNotice;
